tool_description: Identifies potential duplicate taxpayer records using fuzzy matching algorithms and similarity scoring across multiple data points.

search_scope.description: Scope of duplicate search (active_only, all_records, archived)

matching_threshold.description: Similarity threshold for duplicate detection (0.1 to 1.0)

comparison_fields.description: Specific fields to use for comparison

error_messages: Invalid search scope: Use one of [active_only, all_records, archived]
Invalid threshold: Matching threshold must be between 0.1 and 1.0
Empty profile data: Taxpayer profile data cannot be empty
Invalid comparison fields: One or more specified fields are not valid profile fields
Search timeout: Duplicate detection search took too long and was terminated
usage: Provide taxpayer profile data and optionally specify search scope, matching threshold, and comparison fields. Tool returns potential duplicate matches with similarity scores.

potential_matches.description: List of potential duplicate taxpayer IDs

similarity_scores.description: Similarity scores for each potential match
